_note: CUSTOM QUERIES: These completely replace defaults
_required_columns: SDHNUM_0, BPCORD_0, BPDNAM_0, CPY_0, STOFCY_0, DLVDAT_0, XX6FLSIGN_0, COUNT(*) OVER() as total_count

queries.remitos_query: SELECT BPC.XARGTYPCOB_0, SDH.SDHTYP_0, SDHNUM_0, BPCORD_0, BPDNAM_0, CPY_0, STOFCY_0, DLVDAT_0, XX6FLSIGN_0, COUNT(*) OVER() as total_count FROM SDELIVERY SDH INNER JOIN BPCUSTOMER BPC ON BPC.BPCNUM_0 = SDH.BPCORD_0 WHERE DLVDAT_0 > @dlvdat AND CFMFLG_0 = 2 AND CPY_0 = @cpy AND STOFCY_0 = @stofcy {additionalFilters} ORDER BY DLVDAT_0 DESC OFFSET @offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @pageSize ROWS ONLY
